args: Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" . President Donald Trump will make a “big infrastructure announcement” at 4 p.m. at the White House,... President Donald Trump will make a “big infrastructure announcement” at 4 p.m. at the White House, according to his press secretary, Karoline Leavitt. Leavitt, in a Fox News interview, suggested that the announcement would come in lieu of a traditional White House news briefing Tuesday. In the interview, Leavitt also brushed off the uproar over the sweeping pardons that Trump issued Monday to people charged in the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the Capitol. “I don’t think it’s causing much controversy,” she said. “President Trump campaigned on this promise. It should come as no surprise that he delivered on it on Day One.”
